name: adl-m365-automation-starter

scripts.test:postman: newman run tests/postman/postman_collection.json --env-var base_url=http://localhost:8000 --reporters cli --color on
scripts.test:postman:ci: newman run tests/postman/postman_collection.json --env-var base_url=http://localhost:8000 --reporters cli --bail --color on
